title: murugan kavutthuvam
language: TamiljhennakiTTa kiTrakiTTa takkuDu dhikkuDu tarikiTatAtakkiDu dhikkiDu takatari kiTataka takkINam jhekkiNam takavinaiyara vEl vAngum perumAL aDiyinai tozhu manamE jegajegatomkiTu nankiTu tomkiTa kiTataki tomguNAngutOmtOm tAhattA tokiTu tOkiTa nangatAr kiNanakaNaka jekaNakatAgAnam maileri kailAsam tannai shuzhala varum iLaiyava-nE tozhuvAr tALa vidham para uDaiyavanEjEkiTu jennakiTa jenaki
